00019 class Galleria_View_Categories extends Galleria_Viewelement
00020 {
00021 
00031     public static function info($cat)
00032     {
00033         if ($cat->hasPics())
00034             return '<a id="cat-' . $cat->getId() . '" href="' . self::$_http_url . 'browse/?id=' . $cat->getId() . '">' . $cat->getName() . '</a>';
00035         return '<span id="cat-' . $cat->getId() . '">' . $cat->getName() . '</span>';
00036     }
00037 
00047     public static function ulList($cats)
00048     {
00049         $text = '<ul>';
00050         foreach($cats as $cat) {
00051             $text .= '<li>' . self::info($cat);
00052             if ($cat->hasChildren()) {
00053                 $text .= self::ulList($cat->getChildren());
00054             }
00055             $text .= '</li>';
00056         }
00057         return $text . '</ul>';
00058     }
00059 
00069     public static function adminList($cats, $class = null)
00070     {
00071         $text = empty($class) ? '<ul>' : '<ul class="' . $class . '">';
00072         foreach($cats as $cat) {
00073             $text .= '<li id="list_' . $cat->getId() . '">' . $cat->getName();
00074             if ($cat->hasChildren()) {
00075                 $text .= self::adminList($cat->getChildren());
00076             }
00077             $text .= '</li>';
00078         }
00079         return $text . '</ul>';
00080     }
